    import {Form} from 'ivx-js/modules/ui/default/form.js'
    public class | source

    Form

    Creates a form wrapper around these inputs and a submit button to submit the form.

    Constructor Summary

    Public Constructor
    public

    constructor(inputHTML: array, name: string, additionalAttrHTML: string, settings: object)

    Sets up the various data to render this form.

    Member Summary

    Public Members
    public

    additionalAttrHTML: String

    Additional tags to add to this form

    public get

    formClasses: String

    Any default UI classes to add to this form

    public get

    html: string

    Wraps each input's html into a container so they can be formatted correctly utilizing the ivxjs.css's grid system.
    public

    inputHTML: String

    All input html information for this form
    public

    name: String

    Name for this form

    public

    settings: Object

    Settings for this entire form

    public

    style: *

    public

    submit: Object

    Settings for this submit button

    public get

    submitButtonHTML: string

    Renders the HTML to render the

    Public Constructors

    public constructor(inputHTML: array, name: string, additionalAttrHTML: string, settings: object) source

    Sets up the various data to render this form.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    inputHTML array

    All input data to be added to this form
    name string

    name of this form
    additionalAttrHTML string

    Attributes that need to be added to the form primarily used for validation and submit functions.
    settings object

    Global settings for this form.

    Public Members

    public additionalAttrHTML: String source

    Additional tags to add to this form

    public get formClasses: String source

    Any default UI classes to add to this form

    public get html: string source

    Wraps each input's html into a container so they can be formatted correctly utilizing the ivxjs.css's grid system. @type{String}

    public inputHTML: String source

    All input html information for this form

    public name: String source

    Name for this form

    public settings: Object source

    Settings for this entire form

    public style: * source

    public submit: Object source

    Settings for this submit button

    public get submitButtonHTML: string source

    Renders the HTML to render the

    Example:

    Form.settings = {
    submit : {
        label : "My new submit label",
        input : {
           classes : "my-submit-input"
        },
        container : {
            classes : "my-submit-container"
        }
    }
};

//Will Render 

<div class="ivxjs-grid-1-1 my-submit-container">
    <button class="my-submit-input" type="submit">
         My new submit label 
    </button>
</div>
